#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1009
int main()
{
    int m,n,y=0,sum=0;
    scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
    m%=MOD;
    int *a= new int [n+1];
    for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        a[i]%=MOD;
    }
    for(int i=0;i<=m;i++)
    {
        y=0;
        for(int j=0;j<=n;j++)
        {
            y=(a[j]+(i*y)%MOD)%MOD;
        }
        sum=(sum+y)%MOD;
    }
    cout<<sum<<endl;
}
